data.text: Ɔhene akoma da Awurade nsam;
Onipa akwan nyinaa tene wɔ nʼani so,
Sɛ woyɛ adepa ne adeɛ a ɛtene a
Ani a ɛtra ntɔn ne ahomasoɔ akoma,
Nsiyɛfoɔ nhyehyɛeɛ de mfasoɔ ba
Ahonya a nkontompo tɛkrɛma de ba no
Amumuyɛfoɔ basabasayɛ bɛtwe wɔn akɔ,
Onipa a ɔdi fɔ no akwan yɛ kɔntɔnkye,
Suhyɛ twɛtwɛwa ase baabi tena
Omumuyɛfoɔ kɔn dɔ bɔne;
Sɛ wɔtwe fɛdifoɔ aso a, ntetekwaafoɔ hunu nyansa,
Ɔteneneeni no nim deɛ ɛrekɔso wɔ omumuyɛfoɔ fie
Sɛ onipa sisi nʼaso wɔ mmɔborɔni su ho a
Kokoam adekyɛ dwodwo akoma,
Sɛ wobu atɛntenenee a, teneneefoɔ anigye
Onipa a ɔmane firi nhunumu kwan soɔ no
Deɛ ɔdi ahosɛpɛ akyi no bɛyɛ ohiani;
Amumuyɛfoɔ de wɔn nkwa to hɔ ma teneneefoɔ,
Ɛyɛ sɛ wobɛtena ɛserɛ so,
Nnuane pa ne ngo ayɛ onyansafoɔ fie ma,
Deɛ ɔti tenenee ne ɔdɔ no
Onyansafoɔ to hyɛ ahoɔdenfoɔ kuropɔn so
Deɛ ɔkora nʼano ne ne tɛkrɛma no
Ɔhantanni a ɔma ne ho so no, ne din ne “Ɔfɛdifoɔ”
Deɛ ɔkwadwofoɔ kɔn dɔ no bɛyɛ owuo ama no,
Ɛda mu nyinaa ɔpere sɛ ɔbɛnya bebree,
Omumuyɛfoɔ afɔrebɔ yɛ akyiwadeɛ,
Adansekurumdini bɛyera,
Amumuyɛfoɔ di akakabensɛm
Nyansa, nhunumu ne nhyehyɛeɛ biara nni hɔ a
Wɔsiesie apɔnkɔ ma ɔko da,
